messages.message: In build my complex prompts don’t allow curly brackets which means I can’t ask it to complete some json for me

@Arjun it seems you reverted this change in june, but this change was missed in the merge of AI Hub into master https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/42731

should curly braces actually be allowed in field prompts? @lydia
yes! Just asked the model-dev team and there's no reason to disallow braces. I think the same applies to backslash. let me tag you in the question I asked in <#C0547PV8ZME|>
